name: SpotAngels
headline: Waze for parking
description: SpotAngels is Waze for parking. It helps drivers find free parking, protect themselves from parking tickets and get garage deals.
generated_description:
SpotAngels is a compelling startup that aims to be the "Waze for parking." Founded in 2014 and hailing from Y Combinator's S14 batch, this innovative company is headquartered in San Francisco and operates with a nimble team of 11. Their mission? To help drivers locate free parking spaces, avoid parking tickets, and secure deals at garages—an invaluable service in cities known for their parking challenges.

You can dive into their offerings at [SpotAngels.com](http://www.spotangels.com). The app has garnered praise for its user-friendly interface and robust features, making it a favorite among everyday drivers. Users can find free parking, receive timely reminders about street cleaning rules, and discover exclusive garage deals, all aimed at saving them money and headaches.

SpotAngels has spread its wings to cities across North America, including New York City, Los Angeles, and Toronto, confirming its broad relevance in urban environments. Additionally, they offer a premium subscription, SpotAngels Plus, which unlocks exclusive discounts and features for users looking for an enhanced experience.

With its clear focus on solving a significant pain point for urban drivers, SpotAngels is positioned well in the city navigation landscape, simply helping users to outsmart the often frustrating search for parking. The positive feedback from users—like Alyx, who sums it up as “the BEST parking management app out there”—reflects the app’s impact and utility.

If you’re tired of the parking struggle and want to make your life easier, SpotAngels might just be the solution you need.
